title: Attempting to Reconnect while dead
body: I die in game. Ping while I am alive- 60. Ping while I am dead- over 500. Please help, I spawn about 20 secs after my death timer has finished. And its so hard to reconnect. My skype is running ok and i am not sure what happens. please help {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: The game needs a constant, strong connection and it sounds like there is a hiccup keeping you sync'd at respawn.  My recommendation here is to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  There are steps that that should fix this up for good, but hit me up if you have any issues.  {{champion:89}}  Take heart, we'll figure this out!
